patthana15.49:1.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:1.1_1: Bāhiraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:1.1_2: Ajjhattikaṁ kusalañca bāhiraṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:2.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:2.1_1: Bāhiraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:2.1_2: Ajjhattikaṁ akusalañca bāhiraṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
